title: Did Fake ‘Home Affairs’ Officials Commit a Census-Linked Robbery Scam?
subtitle: Social media users in the U.S., U.K., and elsewhere shared a years-old scam with origins in a real criminal operation in South Africa.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A viral social media warning in September 2019 described an actual robbery scam by criminals posing as "Home Affairs" officials.
